description: [WastedLocker](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0612) can perform a UAC bypass if it is not executed with administrator rights or if the infected host runs Windows Vista or later.(Citation: NCC Group WastedLocker June 2020)

external_references.description: Antenucci, S., Pantazopoulos, N., Sandee, M. (2020, June 23). WastedLocker: A New Ransomware Variant Developed By The Evil Corp Group. Retrieved September 14, 2021.
